name: Circle Pong (itch) (MG BEATZ)
description:
A game i made by just watching Vimlark tutorial video or a video he posted explaining how he created a game in just 12 hours

* I focus more on Mobile styled games so you just have to tap the play button , Use the arrows to move the paddle around

i made this game for my friend Aj wyze who have been complaining on how my games are difficult
